monogr.title: The third part of the Countesse of Pembrokes Yuychurch : entituled, Amintas dale. Wherein are the most conceited tales of the pagan gods in English hexameters: together with their auncient descriptions and philosophicall explications. By Abraham Fraunce
monogr.author: Fraunce, Abraham

div.head: Illustrissimae, atque ornatissimae Heroinae, piae, formosae, eruditae: Dominae Mariae, Comitissae Pembrokiensi.
div.l: NYmpha Charis Charitωn, morientis imago Philippi,
Graecia docta dedit, vel regia Roma reliquit,
Quod fructum flori, quod miscuit vtile dulci.
